law.catch_line: Estate for life of another considered personal estate.
law.text: Estates held by a deceased person for life of another shall go to the personal representative of the deceased as assets in his hands, and, shall be applied and distributed as the personal estate.
law.history: Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 3861.
